title: Verify role-based access control for all user roles
description: Check that Owners, Admins, Teachers, Students, and Parents have correct module and feature access permissions as per the RBAC design.

steps.description: Log in as Owner and verify access to all modules and administrative features.
Owner has unrestricted access.
Log in as Admin and verify access to school configuration, user management, and audit logs.
Admin has access restricted to assigned schools with configuration permissions.
Log in as Teacher and access class management, attendance, grading, and communication features.
Teacher can access only assigned classes and related student data.
Log in as Student and verify access to learning materials, assignments, attendance, and progress reports.
Student has access strictly to their own academic and personal data.
Log in as Parent and check monitoring features for their childrenâ€™s academic progress, fees, and messaging.
Parent access limited to their registered children only.

title: Real-time data synchronization across dashboards
description: Ensure that changes in student data, attendance, and academic progress reflect instantaneously for all role dashboards viewing that data.

steps.description: As Teacher, update attendance record for a student.
Student, Parent, and Admin dashboards show updated attendance data immediately without refresh.
Modify student behaviour record and check Teacher and Admin dashboards.
Changes appear in real-time across user sessions.

title: Audit log functionality and accuracy
description: Verify that all critical user actions such as login, data changes, role assignments, and configuration updates are logged with correct user info and timestamps.

steps.description: Perform a set of administrative changes, including user role modifications and school branding updates.
Audit log entries appear with accurate actions, users, and timestamps.
Check that audit logs are accessible and readable by authorized roles only.
Logs are protected from unauthorized access.

title: Student admission and lifecycle management
description: Test student admission through to alumni status updates with all intermediate academic and behavioral data tracked correctly.

steps.description: Add a new student admission with complete required details.
Student appears in the school roster with correct assigned class/stream.
Update attendance, behavior, and health records periodically.
All updates are reflected in student profile and reports.
Change student status to alumni upon graduation.
Alumni status is set and student record locked from academic modification.

title: Class and timetable management with clash detection
description: Generate class schedules and exam timetables verifying clash-free allocations and room assignments.

steps.description: Create class schedules with multiple subjects and assign classrooms.
Conflicting room or teacher assignments are flagged and prevented.
Schedule exams ensuring no student has overlapping sessions.
System detects and disallows conflicting exam times.
Sync timetable with external calendar platforms.
External calendar updates accurately match system schedule.

title: Multi-channel communication delivery
description: Validate messaging, notifications, email, and SMS dispatch to correct recipients based on roles and message types.

steps.description: Send an in-app announcement to teachers and parents.
Announcement appears in respective user dashboards promptly.
Send email and SMS notifications to students for exam alerts.
Emails and SMS are received successfully by intended users.
Trigger emergency broadcast and check receipt across all user roles.
Message delivered instantly and prominently to all users.

title: Finance and billing operations and reconciliation
description: Test fee structures setup, invoice generation, online payment processing, discounts application, and financial report accuracy.

steps.description: Configure multiple fee structures including discounts.
Fee structures applied correctly per class or student category.
Generate invoices and process online payments.
Payments recorded and reflected accurately in balances.
Generate monthly financial reports.
Reports reconcile exactly with transaction data.

title: Offline data capture and synchronization
description: Verify system behavior when operating offline including data capture and subsequent synchronization upon reconnect.

steps.description: With mobile app, switch to offline mode.
Enter attendance records and update student data offline.
Data is cached locally without errors.
Restore internet connectivity.
Offline entries synchronize with central database and reflect on other user dashboards.

title: Customization and module toggle per school
description: Confirm enabling or disabling modules and applying custom branding works per tenant and affects available UI and features accordingly.

steps.description: Disable Library module for a particular school.
Library features and UI are no longer accessible for users of that school.
Apply custom logo and color scheme for a school.
Branding changes appear correctly in all relevant user interfaces.

title: AI-powered performance prediction and risk alert accuracy
description: Evaluate AI outputs for student performance predictions, attendance risk alerts, and timetable optimizations against historical and real-time data.

steps.description: Input historical academic and attendance data for students.
System generates performance predictions matching expected trends.
Trigger attendance risk algorithm after low attendance events.
Risk alerts are generated correctly and notified to teachers and parents.
Optimize timetable using AI-based clash resolution.
Suggested timetable reduces conflicts and improves resource utilization.

title: Mobile application responsiveness and data integrity
description: Verify that mobile apps on Android/iOS respond correctly to different screen sizes, maintain data integrity in offline/online modes, and sync without loss.

steps.description: Access the app on multiple mobile devices with varying screen sizes.
UI components scale and rearrange appropriately for all devices.
Capture data offline on mobile then reconnect.
Data syncs correctly and no data is lost or duplicated.
